summary: Iteration 19: Move to folder feature + full-width tree layout. Backend: 4/4 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All features verified. Fixed 2 critical bugs in backend.

Meetings page tree left-aligned full-wid.notes: No max-w-2xl, tree starts from left

Documents page tree left-aligned full-wi.notes: No max-w-2xl, tree starts from left

Move dialog shows only folders (no root.notes: Documents projects must be in a folder

PUT /api/doc/projects/{id} with folder_i.notes: Fixed by adding folder_id to DocProjectUpdate model

bugs_fixed.issue: PUT endpoint filtered out null values, preventing folder_id: null to move projects to root
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed from 'if v is not None' filter to 'model_dump(exclude_unset=True)'

bugs_fixed.issue: DocProjectUpdate model was missing folder_id field, making move to folder impossible for documents
bugs_fixed.fix: Added 'folder_id: Optional[str] = None' to DocProjectUpdate model

critical_code_review_comments: MeetingsPage.jsx correctly implements moveDialog state and handleMoveProject function
DocumentsPage.jsx correctly implements move feature without root option (documents must be in folders)
Backend uses exclude_unset pattern allowing explicit null values where needed
seed_data_creation: Test folders created during testing (TEST_ prefix) cleaned up by tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Move to folder feature fully functional for both Meetings and Documents. Backend uses exclude_unset pattern. Meetings allows root (null folder_id), Documents requires folder.
